lead_paragraph: Unless the other teams employ a strict strategy that they should have picked up from last year’s World Series, the Detroit Tigers should do this season what they failed to do by one day last year. That would be finish in first place.
snippet: Unless the other teams employ a strict strategy that they should have picked up from last year’s World Series, the Detroit Tigers should do this season what they failed to do by one day last year. That would be finish in first place.
